name: Tentacle Typer
description:
Tentacle Typer is a Lovecraftian text editor. You're a giant tentacle monster with a magic mechanical typewriter, and you're trapped in a steampunk mansion. Psychically rouse elaborate mechanisms by typing almost whatever you want. The entire mansion is a machine, how does it work and what does it want?

Features

  • Write and export .txt files with your many tentacle arms.
  • The environment and rules of reality react based on what you write.
  • Find magic tools and mechanical upgrades for your typewriter.
  • Secret doors, secret rooms, secret words and secret secrets to uncover.
  • Music by Jordan Woerndle



Write a letter to your crush to turn on the crushing machine.

Immanentize dark prophecies while writing jokes for your standup routine.

Writing rhymes for your mixtape? Heat up boilers by spitting fire.

Power up by writing the rough draft to that novel you've been meaning to start for years.
